== 11.10 Status ==

~+'''11.10 FeatureFreeze : August 11, 2011 at 1800 UTC.'''+~

~+'''11.10 Beta 1: Sept 1, 2011.'''+~

~+'''11.10 Release Date:  October 13, 2011'''+~

=== Release Overview ===

* Schedule
** Oneiric Release: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OneiricReleaseSchedule
** Interlock Information: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OneiricReleaseInterlock

* Features
** Release Status: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ReleaseTeam/FeatureStatus
** status.ubuntu.com:  see team tab for traditional team blueprint burndown.

=== Actions Pending ===

* 2011/06/17
** [pitti, Chipaca, wendar] investigate disconnect between the Ubuntu One plans and desktop expectations, and SRU team expectations. - IN PROGRESS
** [ogra_, dbarth, Kaleo] discuss concerns over default to have composite on in metacity for unity-2d, it breaks a lot of apps that use fake transparency (i.e. gksudo has a black background instead of a transparent one) 

* 2011/08/04
** [infinity, NCommander ] clean up the publishing of ubuntu-core images which is different from any other images we've built recommend we have their names changed.
  [skaet, slangasek, cjwatson, pitti, wendar] review transitions, language packs, applications for CD size.   Decision about DVD-> 1.5G needs to be made, and if so, plan for contents. 
  [skaet] put out an appeal for AA's to help clean up the NEW queue over the next week.   Feature Freeze landing.
